page.title: 20Our M.P. and Summary
page.content: The Member of Parliament for this area is Robert MacLennan, a Social Democrat formerly Labour.His constituency of Caithness and Sutherland is one of the biggest, geographically, in the British Isles. The information for these pages has been gathered by the 31 children and two teachers of{Tongue Primary}School. One or two contributions have been made by local residents and much help and patience has been extended to the children while they were working on the project. The children are all happy living in Tongue although in the words of one of them 'It is a very quiet place, but it can sometimes be distracted by planes.'.
